capsules_submitted.utterance: So I'm saying that Hagrid is indeed the Key Guardian and Hunting Ground Guard. That's a pretty important role he plays in the wizarding world. I'm completely certain about it, and I wouldn't hesitate to confirm it if you asked me again.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was just talking to Harry about the Hogwarts grounds and he asked me what my role is here. I told him that I'm the gamekeeper, but more specifically, I'm also the Gamekeeper and Head of Magical Creatures for the school. And you know, it's a big responsibility, but I love every minute of it. I mean, who wouldn't want to spend their days surrounded by Hippogriffs and Thestrals?

I think Hagrid is a really important figure in the wizarding world, especially when it comes to Hogwarts. As the gamekeeper and Care of Magical Creatures teacher, he's always been someone I admire for his dedication to the school and its students. He's also shown himself to be fiercely protective of those he cares about, which is something that's really admirable.
